CutSceneText.Text: Across Balaurea, you'll discover geysers that spout either water or air.
It's possible to ride water spouts to reach high places in a single leap.
With air spouts, just spread your wings to glide your way up.
Unfortunately, geysers tend to attract fierce creatures.
You'll have to deal with them to use the geyser.
Inggison has many geysers that are strategically important. Use them well.
